config.neo4j.cypher.topic.mirea.public.groups:
MERGE (g:Group {id: __value.group_id})
ON CREATE SET g.code = __value.name
ON MATCH SET g.code = __value.name
config.neo4j.cypher.topic.mirea.public.students:
MATCH (g:Group {id: __value.group_id})
MERGE (s:Student {id: __value.student_id})
ON CREATE SET s.name = __value.full_name
ON MATCH SET s.name = __value.full_name
MERGE (s)-[:BELONGS_TO]->(g)
config.neo4j.cypher.topic.mirea.public.shedule_:
MERGE (sch:Schedule {id: __value.shedule_id})
ON CREATE SET sch.title = __value.title, sch.date = date(__value.start_time), sch.duration = __value.duration, sch.course_id = __value.course_id, sch.course_title = __value.course_title, sch.tag = __value.tag
ON MATCH SET sch.title = __value.title, sch.date = date(__value.start_time), sch.duration = __value.duration, sch.course_id = __value.course_id, sch.course_title = __value.course_title, sch.tag = __value.tag
WITH sch
MATCH (g:Group {id: __value.group_id})
MERGE (g)-[:HAS_SCHEDULE]->(sch)
